original_text: Lizards are easy to catch with your hand, but you will see them in kings' palaces. Lizards are easy to catch with your hand, but you will see them in kings' palaces. korean_text: 손에 잡힐 만하여도 왕궁에 있는 도마뱀이니라

sentences.original_text: Lizards are easy to catch with your hand
but you will see them in kings' palaces
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 왕들의 궁전에서 그들을 볼 것입니다
